useCase.name: View Ordered List of Candidates by Interview Points
useCase.description: As a Customer Manager, I want to view an ordered list of candidates based on job interview points.

preconditions.precondition: The Customer Manager is logged in to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The ordered list of candidates based on job interview points is displayed.

failureEndConditions.condition: The system fails to retrieve the ordered list of candidates based on job interview points.

mainSequence.step: Request to see an ordered list of candidates, using the job interview points (grades) is initiated by the Customer Manager.
The system displays the list of job openings to the Customer Manager.
The Customer Manager selects a specific job opening to view the associated candidates.
The system retrieves and lists all candidates related to the selected job opening along with their grades to the Customer Manager.
